abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column notes that Jordan Spieth is one stroke off lead heading into final round of British Open golf tournament; says if Spieth wins tournament, he will become first player since Ben Hogan in 1953 to win the Masters, United States Open and British Open in same year.
lead_paragraph: Spieth shot a 66 during the third round of the British Open and was one stroke off the lead, thanks to a little advice from the fictional “Star Wars” character.

headline.main: With Yoda as His Guide, Jordan Spieth to a New Level Takes His Game
headline.print_headline: Aided by Yoda, Spieth to a New Level Takes His Game

snippet: Spieth shot a 66 during the third round of the British Open and was one stroke off the lead, thanks to a little advice from the fictional “Star Wars” character.
